adrFormatAddress: 28 Washington St, New York, NY 10004, USA

originalText.text:
We had an amazing experience with The Learning Experience for 3K and 4K. Much of that has to do with the Jessica, the Director. She truly cares about the kids. She runs TLE like an incredibly efficient business with a passion for the children in a nurturing environment. After going to another daycare center with my son, we found TLE incredibly on top of everything and consistent.

Jessica is always available and a great communicator. She is always so pleasant and professional. Even after my child started kindergarten, she checked in on him.
We loved our time at TLE and highly recommend it. The staff is great, the center is very well kept and the parent communications are plentiful. Hands down the best decision we made was to send our son to TLE for preschool.

originalText.text:
We had our son enrolled in TLE Chicago between 2019-2020. When we moved back to NY, we were excited to learn that there was a TLE close by.
TLE Battery Park has met our expectations and more! To start, the staff is absolutely amazing. Jessica, Rene and Samantha are always very helpful, warm and extremely responsive. You feel that they love and care about what they do and have so much love for the children and other staff members.
Our son graduated from TLE in May and has made lifelong memories and friends. The curriculum is great, and he got accepted into one of preferred schools.
We also enrolled our daughter when she was six months old. She loves all of her teachers and friends. We feel like the level of love and attention that they give the LOs is more than we could have hoped for. She is now 2 and is learning so much!
I would 100% recommend TLE to anyone!

originalText.text: The Learning Experience Manhattan would get one million stars if that was possible. We enrolled by 4 month old daughter with reservations because she was so little. The Learning Experience exceeded all expectations and helped nurture her into the spunky 11 month old she is today. Sadly, we needed to move out of the city and the most difficult part of our decision by far was leaving The Learning Experience Manhattan. Our baby loved it so much and came home with a smile on her face every day. From the extraordinary director, Jessica Pollard, who I cannot speak highly enough about, to the teachers in the infant room and the assistant director, Miss Renee, TLE Manhattan was a dream come true for us. We are so sad to leave the comfort of knowing that our baby was in the best of hands every day. We love you TLE Manhattan!

originalText.text: We were beyond fortunate to get a spot in TLE for my son to attend PreK, it blew our expectations.  Jessica is very responsive, caring and helpful with each and ever kid (and family) who walks through that school.  The facilities are clean, safe and pleasant to be around.  The teachers were exceptional, my son LOVED TLE and looked forward everyday to attending.  My son learned so much through their curriculum, I appreciated the HW to reinforce the learnings each week.  We are all sad we had only 1 year there and now off to Kindergarten.

originalText.text: My daughter loved this school and wished she could stay for Kindergarten but it only goes up to PreK. Her preschool teachers, Ms. Des and Ms. Melissa are great! They taught her everything she knows from her letters, numbers, writing and other helpful life skills. Also, unlike other preschools that doesn’t believe in homework, her teacher assigned weekly homework to reinforce what she learned that week in class! As a parent, I appreciated that 1000%. When you get a tour around the center as a parent, you will realize right away how safe, clean and well-run this center is! Beyond lucky to have been part of the TLE family.
